items.title: Israeli strike on Yemen's Houthis reportedly kills eight
items.description: The Israeli military says its "most powerful strike" in Yemen targeted security and military targets, but the Houthis say civilian facilities were hit...

items.title: Dallas shooter intended target to be ICE not detainees - officials
items.description: One detainee was killed and two others critically injured after a shooting at a Dallas ICE facility on Wednesday.

items.title: Trump urges Turkey to stop buying Russian oil as Erdogan chases deal on F-35s
items.description: The US president suggests the US could lift sanctions on Turkey and allow it to buy F-35 jets.

items.title: From former president to future prisoner: Sarkozy's conviction divides France
items.description: Sarkozy is back where he used to be â€“ dominating the news and dividing the nation, writes the BBC's Hugh Schofield.

items.title: Palestinian president says ready to work with Trump for two-state peace plan
items.description: In a speech to the UN, Mahmoud Abbas also calls on more countries to recognise a Palestinian state.
